titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Roger Keeran Photographs PHOTOS.187

publicationstmt.publisher: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2014-09-25T17:11-0400

change.item: Edited by Mary Corcoran for compliance with DACS and Tamiment Required Elements for Archival Description. Edited by Nicole Greenhouse to reflect updated administrative information

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

did.abstract: The Roger Keeran Photographs document a meeting and a picnic held by District Council 65 of the United Automobile Workers (UAW). The dates and locations of both events are unknown.

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Scholar Roger Keeran publicly identifies as a member of the Communist Party, and as of 2013, Keeran is the Labor and Policy Studies Coordinator at Empire State College in New York. Keeran has published widely on subjects related to labor, communism, and the Left.
District Council 65 began its affiliation with the UAW in 1979. In 1994, District Council 65 dissolved as a result of bankruptcy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Roger Keeran Photographs; PHOTOS 187; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The Tamiment Library does not have information about who owns copyright to this collection. Materials in this collection are expected to enter the public domain in 2103. The Tamiment Library is not authorized to grant permission to publish or reproduce materials from this collection.

processinfo.head: Processing Information Note
processinfo.p: The Roger Keeran Photographs were rehoused in a shared box in March 2013.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Provenance is unknown. The accession numbers associated with this collection are 1950.039 and NPA.2001.002.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Materials have been arranged by an archivist within 3 folders.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Archival Materials Note
relatedmaterial.p:

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The Roger Keeran Photographs document a meeting and a picnic held by District Council 65 of the United Automobile Workers of America (UAW).
